plugin.label: delay_n
plugin.name: Simple delay line, noninterpolating
plugin.p: Based on work by James McCartney in SuperCollider.

port.label: max_delay
port.name: Max Delay (s)
port.p: Maximum delay. Used to set the delay buffer size upon activation. Cannot be modulated. Note that if you do not connect to this port before activation, it will default to 1 second.
